title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 77.5 - Experience for physical therapist assistants
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 77.5 - Experience for physical therapist assistants

State Regulations

There shall be no experience required beyond that required
as a component of an educational program for physical therapist assistants
licensed by the department. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
